posts.post_title: FS/FT Nice T206/T205 HOFers Johnson/Matty/Young etc.  PRICES REDUCED
posts.post_content: Posted By: Matt For sale or trade, the 5 cards below all display nicer then their technical grade for the reasons given; none of the cards have any hidden creasing. All cards are untrimmed/unaltered. Due to many requests, I have listed asking prices, and will consider all offers. High resolution scans are provided. Email with questions. T206 Johnson Pitching w/Tolstoi back. T206 Young Glove Shows. Clean Piedmont 350 back. [IMG]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/3748/scan0007fr9.jpg[/IMG] T206 Bresnahan Portrait. [IMG]http://img120.imageshack.us/img120/9235/scan0013jb6.jpg[/IMG] T206 Johnson Portrait. T205 Mathewson. Card has maintained much of the original gold and the front is spectacular. Back has significant paper loss. Slabbed as an SGC 10. SOLD
